proxy

Class TranslatorJSON

  • java.lang.Object
    • proxy.TranslatorJSON
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITranslator

    public class TranslatorJSON
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITranslator
    Author:
    Epper Marshall This is used to translate a Java Object into JSON or to convert JSON back into an Object.
    Domain a string in json or a java obj (gameModel)

      • translateFrom

        public java.lang.Object translateFrom(java.lang.String message,
                             java.lang.Class<?> responseCastClass)
        Translates JSON into type responseCastClass(GameModel). If it returns true no translation/update is necessary.
        Specified by:
        translateFrom in interface ITranslator
        Precondition:
        json string
        Postcondition:
        returns the equivalent Java Object
